alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin, southern Crawford and northern Sebastian Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Dyer, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mulberry... Dyer... Bonanza... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Mill Creek... Rye Hill... Dora... Vesta... Furry... Ursula... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
